duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients with daily activities such as feeding, grooming, and toileting.
Educate and teach patients and their families under the direction of a Registered Nurse.
Collect, report, and document data related to direct patient care activities.
Support the maintenance of a clean and safe patient care environment, conduct companion care, and housekeeping tasks.
Communicate with hospital staff, physicians, patients, families, and visitors to provide assistance and information.
Process medical treatment and test orders, retrieve patient test and lab results, and schedule patient appointments.
Maintain patient records, observe the cardiac monitor, and notify the nursing and medical staff of any abnormal heart rhythm variances.

education_certification.credential: Certification as a Nursing Assistant or completion of a nursing education program, or successful completion of an RN program. Basic Life Support Health Care Provider card through American Heart Association.
